column1: Pete was in the park playing on the monkey bars. Pete wanted to climb to the highest bar. The monkey bar was very strong. A bird lands on Pete's nose. Pete feels the bird landing on his nose.

Bree was at the mall to buy a gift for her mom. She wanted to buy her mom's favorite famous perfume. The perfume bottles were all neatly aligned on the shelf. A loud announcement comes over the mall's PA system about a surprise sale. Bree hears the announcement about the surprise sale.

Sam was at the park near the lake, waiting for his friends. He wanted to play with his new toy boats in the lake. There was a box of toy boats sitting next to him, all of them were inside. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Sam sees the butterfly landing on the flower.

Vito was in the attic looking for his old toys. Vito wanted to find his favorite toy car. The boxes in the attic were neatly aligned. A bird flies into the attic through the open window. Vito sees the bird.

Quin was in the park playing with his toy bunny. Quin wanted to hop around just like his toy bunny. The grass in the park was dry and easy to hop on. A grumpy squirrel runs by, chattering loudly. Quin sees the grumpy squirrel.
Peter was at the park, playing with his new red ball. Peter wanted to play catch with his dad. The ball had a great, new smell. A squirrel runs across the park. Peter sees the squirrel.

Yara was at the beach making a sand castle. Yara wanted to build the best sand castle ever. The sand was dry and hard to shape. A seagull lands on the sand castle. Yara sees the seagull landing on her sand castle.

Uma was at the beach on a hot day. Uma wanted to build a huge sandcastle. The bucket she was using was shiny and reflected the heat well. A seagull swoops down and steals a sandwich from a nearby picnic. Uma sees the seagull stealing the sandwich.

Ulysses was at the opera house, waiting for the show to start. Ulysses wanted to hear the cool opera singer perform. The opera singer was ready to sing. A group of musicians starts playing jazz in the lobby. Ulysses hears the jazz music.

Vito was at the park playing with his toy car. Vito wanted to eat his lunch that his mom packed for him. The lunch box was full of good things to eat. A blue bird lands on a nearby tree. Vito sees the blue bird.
Ethan was at the park after school. Ethan wanted to eat his candy because he was very hungry. The candy was in Ethan's bag. A group of ducks waddles by. Ethan sees the ducks waddling by.

Dino, a young boy, was in the park near the farm. Dino wanted to jog around the park and then have a tasty apple from the farmer's stall. The apple basket at the farmer's stall was untouched. A dog starts barking at the squirrel. Dino hears the dog barking.

column1: Ina was playing with her ball in the park. Ina wanted to kick the ball high up in the sky. The ball was under normal pressure. A rough wind starts to blow in the park. Ina feels the rough wind.

Yara was in the park, sitting on a bench. Yara wanted to make a small scarf for her doll. The ball of yarn she had was big and soft. A squirrel climbs up the tree next to the bench. Yara sees the squirrel.

Ken was at a fair, looking at all the fun games and tasty food. Ken wanted to win the pie-eating contest. The apple pie for the contest was not toxic. A clown starts juggling nearby. Ken sees the clown juggling.

Ben was at the park, playing with his friends. Ben wanted to win the treasure hunt game they were playing. There was a box of fake jewelry that was the prize. A healthy bird lands on a nearby tree. Ben sees the healthy bird.

Sam was in the kitchen, ready to bake a cake. Sam wanted to bake a cake for his mom's birthday, which was tomorrow. The calendar on the fridge showed today's date. A squirrel runs across the kitchen window. Sam sees the squirrel.

Remy was at a party, having a fun time. Remy wanted to throw the orange veil he found in the corner to his friend. The orange veil was bright under the party lights. A dog runs into the party. Remy sees the dog.

Lenny was at the park building a sand castle. Lenny wanted to decorate his sand castle with pretty shells he found. The bucket he was using to carry the shells was full. A gust of wind blows some ash from a nearby barbecue into the air. Lenny sees the ash being blown into the air.

Pablo was in the jungle looking for a place to rest. Pablo wanted to find a dependable tree to sit and enjoy his lunch. The big tree near him was strong and sturdy. A colorful parrot lands on a nearby branch. Pablo sees the colorful parrot.
Quin was at the park with his dog, Spot. Quin wanted to train Spot to fetch a magazine. The magazine was big and heavy. A bossy squirrel runs across the park. Quin sees the bossy squirrel.

Ina was at the park doing her morning run. Ina wanted to finish her run so she could start her day. The roof of the park's gazebo was clear from leaves. A fit jogger approaches Ina and asks for directions. Ina hears the jogger and turns to answer him.

Yara was at the park playing with her friends. Yara wanted to win the game of marbles they were playing. One marble, a shiny pebble, was very expensive. A butterfly lands on Yara's shoulder. Yara sees the butterfly.
Umar was at the park with his friends. Umar wants to play ball with his friends. The ball that Umar has is fresh and new. A loud noise comes from a nearby construction site. Umar hears the noise.

Xander was in his office, working on his computer. Xander wished to mail his boss a report about the new steel factory. The report on Xander's desk was consistent and complete. A hidden bird in the office starts to sing. Xander hears the bird singing.

Xander was in the library studying for his test. Xander wanted to find the symbol of knowledge in his book to understand his lesson better. The book was very old and its pages were dry. A cat walks into the library. Xander sees the cat.

Nino was at his friend's party. Nino wanted to tell a joke to make his friends laugh. Nino's mother's phone was off. A clown enters the room to entertain the children. Nino sees the clown.

Dino was at the fish store, looking at all the different fish. Dino wanted to buy a very big fish for his fish tank. The scale in the store was shiny. A loyal dog runs into the store. Dino sees the loyal dog.
Andy was at the park with his little sister. Andy wants to play catch with his sister. The infant in the pram nearby is quiet. A squirrel runs across the park. Andy sees the squirrel.

Zara was in the park, near the big tree. Zara wants to tie a pink ribbon around the tree to mark her favorite spot. The ribbon was neatly knotted around the tree. A child's balloon floats by. Zara sees the child's balloon.

Remy was in a snowy field, building an igloo. Remy wanted to finish the igloo before the sun went down. The block of ice Remy was using to build the igloo was unburnt. A restless polar bear wandered into the field. Remy sees the restless polar bear.

Wally was at a party with his friends. Wally wants to impress his friends by showing them his magic tricks. The brown purse on the table is full of coins. A dog runs into the room and starts barking. Wally sees the dog.

Finn was in the park, sitting under a beautiful big tree. Finn wanted to find a big acorn to take home. The acorn at Finn's feet was whole and untouched. A colorful kite flies overhead. Finn sees the colorful kite.

Peter was at the park ready to play. Peter wants to meet his friend and play in the park. The swing in the park was not moving. A squirrel runs across the park. Peter sees the squirrel.

Ben was in his science lab at school. Ben wanted to test the strength of a thin piece of metal for his project. The metal piece was flat and shiny. A bird flies into the lab through the open window. Ben sees the bird.

Gabe was in the kitchen getting ready to make a sandwich. Gabe wanted to cut the bread with his knife. The knife was sharp. A gloomy cloud covered the sun, making the kitchen darker. Gabe noticed the kitchen getting darker.
Vito was in his science class at school. Vito wanted to show his friends his new magnet. The magnet was in Vito's bag. The school bell rings for lunch. Vito hears the school bell.

Otto was on a farm during the day. Otto wanted to count all of his sheep to make sure they were all there. The gate to the sheep pen was locked. A loud crow caws from a nearby tree. Otto hears the crow cawing.

Greta was in the doctor's office, waiting her turn. She wanted to be the next patient to be seen by the doctor. The window in the doctor's office was clear. A purple bird lands on the window sill. Greta sees the purple bird.
Harry was at the park playing with his toy car. Harry wanted to make his toy car go fast. The toy car was not charged. A bird makes a loud sound from the tree nearby. Harry hears the bird's sound.

Vito was in the park, enjoying his picnic. Vito wanted to solve the crossword puzzle that was in his newspaper. The paperclip holding his papers was straight. A squirrel runs across the picnic blanket. Vito notices the squirrel.

Ned was at the lively football stadium to watch his favorite team play. Ned wanted to pick up a hot dog from the food stand during half-time. The food stand at the stadium was open. A bird flies over the stadium. Ned sees the bird.

Bob was at the friendly town fair near the old mill. Bob wanted to win the dance contest. A big jug of water was full and sitting on a table. A clown starts to juggle near the mill. Bob sees the clown juggling.

Sally was in her garden, ready to plant some new flowers. Sally wanted to dig a hole using her shiny spade. The spade was new and unscratched. A delicious smell of freshly baked cookies wafts from the kitchen. Sally smells the cookies.

Sam was in the library looking for a book to read. Sam wanted to find a silly book to make him laugh. The bookshelf was organized with books in their places. A librarian announces that the library will be closing in 15 minutes. Sam hears the librarian's announcement.

Remy was at a park playing near a big tree. Remy wanted to climb the tree to see the birds up close. The tree was very strong and sturdy. A spicy smell from a nearby food stall wafts through the park. Remy smells the spicy food.

Ben was in the kitchen making a tall sandwich for lunch. Ben wanted to eat the sandwich and then go play outside. The sandwich was not yet complete. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Ben sees the bird in the kitchen.
